p: IL-1β mRNA copy numbers, which are related to inflammatory processes, were found significantly overexpressed in the Aβ1-42 pretreated group (II) vs. the sham-operated group (I) ( p = 0.0032) ( Figure 3). Yet, the inhaled OmEO attenuated only slightly the inflammatory response observed in Aβ1-42-pretreated rats, the minor changes induced by both concentrations of OmEO being statistically insignificant ( p = 0.1107 for 1%OmEO (III) and p = 0.0635 for 3%OmEO (IV), respectively).
